events.description: Super Gold Scratcher is here, who knows what you may get!
events.name: Super Scratcher.

events.description: Defeat the Adelheid clones a certain number of times during the event to get Adelheid[Frag].

events.description: Hot Runes event unlocks, come get it and increase your power now!
events.name: Hot Runes.

events.description: Club Shopping Spree is available for limited time! Come exchange for rare items! Accumulate the event points together with your club members to gain extra club rewards after the event! (Daily Reset)
events.name: Club Shopping Spree.

events.description: During the the event, spin the Wheel of Fortune and get rare items including Boss fighter frags & Boss Aid Soul!
events.name: Wheel of Fortune.

events.description: Recharge certain amounts once to get valuable rewards!
events.name: Single Top-up for Resources.

events.description: Come and eat fruits with Kula to get rewards!

events.description: Weapons can be exchanged for "Equipment Frag" during the event, and you can exchange "Equipment Frag" for useful weapons.

events.description: During the event, 50% off for first Openx10 of Equipment Chest every day! (Daily Reset)

events.description: Mirage Challenge chance+2 during the event! Come challenge Mirage Challenge stages!
events.name: Mirage Challenge Chance+2.

events.description: 1 of 2 Lucky Draw is coming! Silent Soldier Leona and Superstar Athena are waiting for you! Don't miss out!
